_description: A love song — four lines (with music)

BodAsh191IV.Transcription:
luf wil with variancebe cause of repentauncefor who so loueth
                    with outyn gouernaunceOft tyme it doyh hym grevaunceNo herfor with a
                    visance luf will with variance
BodAsh191IV.Note:
Repeated twice with slight variation, accompanied by musical
                    notation.
